name: Raging Retiree
description:
Electricity is one of the most important inventions of humanity. It improves our quality of life and allows us to take advantage of many helpful devices. But did anybody think about possible consequences? This game is about this one incident which occured in a small peaceful town called Lil Discoton. This one little incident which changed our view on electricity entirely. It all begun with an old lady...

Take control over the scooter and prevent it from crashing into a wall. You may cause chaos on your way thorugh the town but watch out for solid walls. There´s a lot to accomplish and conquer during the game. Can you achieve everything and become the legendary raging retiree?
